title: The Columbus Dispatch: Local News, Politics & Sports in Columbus, OH
text:
Former AmplifyBio employee sues company after mass layoffs

AmplifyBio said in a statement April 4, saying the decision to close followed months of efforts to keep the four-year-old firm afloat.
